short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save businesses from Yelp or Google to a spreadsheet, send personal DMs on Facebook or Instagram, and estimate revenue using ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your B2B sales efforts with the AI-powered Small Business Prospector, the ultimate tool for lead generation and business analysis designed specifically for reaching brick-and-mortar businesses. Whether you're a sales professional, agency, or an independent consultant, the Small Business Prospector helps you save time and supercharge your outreach.

Key Features:

Automated Messaging: Detect Facebook or Instagram messenger pages automatically, and get AI-crafted messages using the latest ChatGPT API. Save your selling and ask inputs, and let our tool draft engaging, personalized messages that you can send instantly.

Business Analysis: Analyze businesses on Yelp and Google Maps. Get detailed insights about their revenue estimates and online health score based on reviews. Drive your sales strategy with data, and optimize your efforts.

Build Prospect Lists: Save analyzed businesses to lists. Select or create a list from the dropdown menu, and save businesses with their data points. Make your lead management hassle-free and efficient.

Data Export: All lists are saved to Chrome storage and can be easily exported as CSVs. Whether it's data from API calls or the results of business analysis like revenue estimation, keep all information at your fingertips.

Experience the power of automation, data-driven insights, and seamless lead management, all in one tool. Install the Small Business Prospector and revolutionize your B2B sales approach.
